In more detail

This privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") governs and describes how Condens Insights GmbH and its subsidiaries ("Condens", "we," "us" or "our") may collect, use, and disclose personal information when you use our products or services, or otherwise interact with Condens (for example, attending Condens events), unless a different privacy policy is displayed.

In more detail

This privacy policy ("Privacy Policy") governs and describes how Condens Insights GmbH and its subsidiaries ("Condens", "we," "us" or "our") may collect, use, and disclose personal information when you use our products or services, or otherwise interact with Condens (for example, attending Condens events), unless a different privacy policy is displayed.

Cookies
In the webapp, we only use cookies for user authentication.
On our website, we use cookies to better understand how we can improve our offering and marketing efforts.
On the website, we use cookies from Hubspot , Google Ads and LinkedIn Insight to better understand how we can improve our offering and marketing efforts.
Privacy Policy

What information we collect about you
We also receive your email address from other Service users when they provide it in order to invite you to our Services.
We collect information about how you interact with our webapp.

We collect information about you when you register for an account, create or modify your profile, set preferences or sign-up for the Services.
When you use the Services, we share certain information about you with Service users that are in the same account as you for collaboration purposes: You can create content, which may contain information about you, and others can see, share, edit, copy and download that content.
